name: GHOSTZ (c) 1995
description:
LET THIS CUTIE HAUNT YOUR WEB BROWSER! FEED, PLAY WITH, AND MAYBE EVEN RELEASE IT FROM THIS REALM! PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE!

if you have trouble playing in browser, consider downloading the html file and running it from there. i've had some weird bugs that were fixed this way. honestly im kinda thinking this game is haunted with the variety of bizarre bugs different people have had. anyway thanks! love ya!
